'''Resounding Melodies''' is a Music [[Bundle]] available from October 30, 2023 12:00 (GMT+8) &ndash; December 19, 2023 06:00 (GMT+8).

It can be purchased from the [[Gift Shop]] for {{Item|Genesis Crystal|30|x=1,280}} and contains the following items:<ref>Official Announcement: [https://act.hoyoverse.com/puzzle/hk4e/pz_XJro91snUM/index.html GENSHIN CONCERT TOUR - GENSHIN CONCERT - MELODIES OF AN ENDLESS JOURNEY]</ref>
{{Card List|Primogem*1,000;Celebration: Euphonia*1;Wings of Transient Dreams*1;Sublime Crane Feather Strings*1|delim=;|stars=1|show_caption=1}}

==Obtain Notes==
It is possible to purchase the Resounding Melodies bundle before receiving a physical item redemption card, however, will result in one of the following:
# If the player has already purchased the "Resounding Melodies" bundle in-game, using the in-game item redemption code will only garner Primogems &times;980, "Resounding Melodies" Festive Furnishing &times;1, and Sticky Honey Roast &times;5.
# If the player has already used the in-game redemption code to redeem in-game rewards, purchasing the "Resounding Melodies" bundle from the in-game Shop will only garner Primogems &times;1,000 and "Resounding Melodies" Festive Furnishing &times;1.
